items.title: US demands EU reverse new climate rules to allow surge in gas imports
bullets: • US and Qatar, two of the three largest LNG exporters in the world, sent a letter to the European Union
• The EU should either completely repeal or substantially cut back the new rules, according to the letter
• The directive requires gas exporters to the 27-country bloc to show they protect human rights and are cutting their planet-heating emissions

• Their lawyers say all of them had finished serving their sentences in the US and there was no legal basis to imprison them again

items.title: ‘The Conjuring: Last Rites’ is a Drawn-Out Conclusion to a Dependable Franchise [Review]
bullets: • It’s been twelve years since the first Conjuring movie was released, or I should say, unleashed on the general public in 2013

items.title: Theater counts: Tron: Ares lights up 4,000 theaters across North America
bullets: • The film marks the third installment in the Tron franchise, following 1982's Tron and 2010’s Tron: Legacy, which together have grossed $426 million worldwide
• The sci-fi action epic features an all-star cast led by Jared Leto as Ares, a super-intelligent entity torn between his programmed directives and the emergence of emotions
